After 5 years playing it, I didn't improve my skills in-game.

However, I learned new language skills: now I can curse in Russian.

Also, my tolerance level to guttural screams and loud sounds was increased.

Better than any psychiatric therapy. 10/10
very good game, never met a single toxic person. the teammates are always nice and communicate well. As an European, I especially enjoy playing casual with 8 year old Russian kids who scream.
